text:
When the Mozilla 1.0 browser tried to establish a SSL connection with Coyote
Connector installed on Tomcat 4.0.3, the browser failed the handshake and
returned message like:

"Could not establish an encrypted connection because certificate presented by
xxxx.net is invalid or corrupted.  Error Code: -8101"

The IE browsers (various versions checked) don't have the same problem.  

Details:
- Apache Web Server 2.0
- J2SE 1.4
- Tomcat 4.0.3
- SSL Certificate from Thawte
- Mozilla 1.0 (Release)
creator: comp118cat@yahoo.com
medthomas@ntlworld.com
text:
I have tested this successfully with Tomcat 4.1.x-HEAD and Mozilla 1.4.

I don't know if this is/was a Tomcat bug, Mozilla bug or a configuration 
error. If you are able to re-create this with the latest versions on Tomcat 
and Mozilla please reopen this bug, provide a test case and I will be happy to 
look at it further.
